summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1645, for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue North and Thirteenth Avenue North, each from East Boston Street to Miller Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 17447 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
